query: Check if this implementation plan will work with Claude Code
expected_behavior: Evaluates task granularity (tasks should be focused, not sprawling)
Checks if there's a clearly defined minimal core ('Land' phase)
Verifies tasks can be completed independently without excessive context
Assesses if each task touches reasonable number of files (ideally <5-10)
Checks for iterative 'Land and Expand' pattern
Checks for session/phase splitting when tasks exceed context limits
Provides specific, actionable feedback on what to improve
If QA workflow exists: assesses QA round structure and session planning
